recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. This creamy and delicious recipe is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner.
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Meanwhile, fry pancetta until crispy. Beat eggs with Parmesan and pepper. Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta water. Toss hot pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat and stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed for creaminess.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender pieces of marinated chicken in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce with aromatic spices. A beloved Indian dish that's full of flavor.
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the spice for 2 hours. Sauté onion and garlic, add remaining spice. Add tomatoes and simmer. Grill chicken, then add to sauce with coconut cream. Simmer 15 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Fresh romaine lettuce with homemade Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan. A classic salad that's simple yet sophisticated.
recipes.instructions: Wash and chop romaine. Toss with Caesar dressing. Top with croutons and Parmesan. Serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Tacos al Pastor
recipes.description: Authentic Mexican street tacos with marinated pork, pineapple, and fresh toppings. A flavor explosion in every bite!
recipes.instructions: Marinate pork in achiote paste overnight. Grill pork and pineapple until charred. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with pork, pineapple, onion, and cilantro. Serve with lime and salsa.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Thailand's most famous noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and savory flavors.
recipes.instructions: Soak noodles until soft. Make sauce with tamarind and fish sauce. Stir-fry shrimp and tofu, push aside. Scramble eggs. Add noodles and sauce. Toss everything together. Top with peanuts and bean sprouts.

recipes.title: Classic Beef Burger
recipes.description: Juicy homemade beef patties with melted cheese, crispy bacon, and all your favorite toppings. The ultimate American comfort food!
recipes.instructions: Form beef into 4 patties, season with salt and pepper. Cook bacon until crispy. Grill burgers 4 minutes per side, add cheese to melt. Toast buns. Assemble burgers with all toppings.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Homemade California rolls with crab, avocado, and cucumber. Fresh, healthy, and surprisingly easy to make at home!
recipes.instructions: Cook rice and season with rice vinegar. Lay nori on bamboo mat. Spread rice, flip over. Add fillings in a line. Roll tightly. Slice into 8 pieces. Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and ginger.

recipes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
recipes.description: Decadent individual chocolate cakes with a molten center. The perfect dessert to impress your guests!
recipes.instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together. Whisk eggs, yolks, and sugar until thick. Fold in chocolate mixture and flour. Pour into greased ramekins. Bake at 425°F for 12 minutes. Let rest 1 minute, invert onto plates. Serve with ice cream.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: The trendy breakfast favorite! Creamy avocado on crispy sourdough with a perfectly poached egg and everything bagel seasoning.
recipes.instructions: Toast bread until golden. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Poach eggs in simmering water. Spread avocado on toast. Top with poached egg. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with seasonings.

recipes.title: Greek Moussaka
recipes.description: Layered eggplant casserole with spiced meat sauce and creamy béchamel. A hearty Greek comfort food.
recipes.instructions: Salt eggplant slices and let drain. Brown lamb with onions, add tomatoes and cinnamon. Make béchamel with butter, flour, and milk. Brush eggplant with oil and bake until soft. Layer eggplant, meat, and béchamel. Top with cheese. Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.

recipes.title: Vietnamese Pho
recipes.description: Aromatic beef noodle soup with rice noodles, tender beef slices, and fresh herbs. A comforting bowl of Vietnamese tradition.
recipes.instructions: Simmer bones and brisket with spices for 8 hours. Strain broth. Cook noodles. Slice brisket thinly. Assemble bowls with noodles, broth, beef. Top with herbs, bean sprouts. Serve with lime, sriracha, and hoisin.

recipes.title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: Healthy vegetarian bowl packed with quinoa, roasted vegetables, chickpeas, and tahini dressing.
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa. Roast sweet potato and chickpeas with spices. Massage kale with olive oil. Make tahini dressing with lemon. Assemble bowls with quinoa, vegetables, chickpeas. Top with avocado and dressing.

recipes.title: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: Classic French soup with caramelized onions, rich beef broth, and melted Gruyère cheese on toast.
recipes.instructions: Slowly caramelize onions in butter with sugar for 45 minutes. Add wine and reduce. Add broth and herbs, simmer 30 minutes. Toast baguette. Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls, top with bread and cheese. Broil until bubbly.

recipes.title: Korean Bibimbap
recipes.description: Colorful rice bowl topped with seasoned vegetables, gochujang sauce, and a fried egg.
recipes.instructions: Cook rice. Marinate beef in soy and sesame. Blanch and season vegetables separately. Stir-fry beef. Fry eggs sunny-side up. Arrange rice in bowls, top with vegetables, beef, egg. Serve with gochujang and sesame oil.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Authentic Neapolitan pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and San Marzano tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Roll out dough. Crush tomatoes with garlic and salt. Spread on dough. Tear mozzarella over top. Bake at 500°F for 10 minutes until crust is golden. Top with fresh basil and olive oil.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: Elegant beef tenderloin wrapped in mushroom duxelles and puff pastry. Perfect for special occasions.
recipes.instructions: Sear beef, brush with mustard. Make mushroom duxelles. Layer prosciutto, duxelles, pâté. Wrap beef. Encase in puff pastry. Brush with egg wash. Bake at 400°F for 40 minutes. Rest before slicing.

recipes.title: Caprese Sandwich
recipes.description: Simple Italian sandwich with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze on ciabatta.
recipes.instructions: Slice ciabatta and toast lightly. Layer mozzarella and tomato slices. Add basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.description: Hot and sour Thai soup with shrimp, lemongrass, and fragrant herbs.
recipes.instructions: Bring broth to boil with lemongrass, galangal, lime leaves. Add mushrooms and shrimp. Season with fish sauce and chilies. Finish with lime juice. Garnish with cilantro.

recipes.title: Falafel Wrap
recipes.description: Crispy chickpea fritters wrapped in pita with fresh vegetables and tahini sauce.
recipes.instructions: Blend chickpeas with herbs and spices. Form into balls. Deep fry until golden. Warm pita. Fill with falafel, vegetables, tahini sauce.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy American pancakes perfect for weekend breakfast.
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk eggs, milk, butter. Combine wet and dry. Cook on griddle until bubbles form, flip. Serve with butter and maple syrup.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
recipes.instructions: Whisk yolks and sugar over double boiler. Cool and fold in mascarpone. Mix espresso with rum. Dip ladyfingers in coffee. Layer with mascarpone cream. Refrigerate 4 hours. Dust with cocoa before serving.

recipes.title: Ramen Bowl
recipes.description: Rich Japanese noodle soup with pork belly, soft-boiled egg, and flavorful broth.
recipes.instructions: Braise pork belly until tender. Make broth with miso and soy. Cook noodles. Soft-boil eggs. Slice pork. Assemble bowls with noodles, broth, pork, egg. Garnish with green onions, nori, sesame.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Baja-style tacos with crispy fish, cabbage slaw, and creamy sauce.
recipes.instructions: Make beer batter. Coat fish and fry until golden. Mix cabbage with lime. Make creamy sauce with mayo and lime. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with fish, slaw, sauce, cilantro.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Middle Eastern breakfast with eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions, peppers, garlic. Add tomatoes and spices. Simmer 10 minutes. Make wells and crack eggs into sauce. Cover and cook until eggs set. Top with feta and parsley. Serve with pita.

recipes.title: Smoothie Bowl
recipes.description: Thick, creamy açaí smoothie bowl topped with fresh fruits, granola, and seeds.
recipes.instructions: Blend açaí, banana, berries with milk until thick. Pour into bowl. Top with granola, sliced fruits, seeds, coconut. Drizzle with honey.

reviews.comment: Absolutely delicious! The creamy sauce was perfect. I followed the recipe exactly and it turned out amazing. My family loved it!
Great recipe! I added a bit more pepper for extra kick. Cooking time was spot on.
Best Chicken Tikka Masala I've ever made! The marination really makes a difference. Will definitely make again.
